text: Matías Jesús Noble (born 9 August 1996) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Quilmes. ==Career== Noble started his youth career with Gimnasia y Esgrima in 2007, making the step into senior football in 2015. He was an unused substitute for Argentine Primera División matches against Tigre and Rosario Central in August 2015, prior to making his senior debut on 5 February 2016 in a defeat to Banfield. Twelve more appearances followed in 2016 which ended with serious injury, before Noble played four times in 2016–17.
